snippet: The police in Birmingham said the boy had “viciously attacked” a year-old girl after her mother left them alone while she visited a nightclub.
abstract: Unidentified 8-year-old boy faces murder charges for brutally beating toddler to death after murder victim's mother left children unattended in Birmingham, Ala.
lead_paragraph: The police in Birmingham said the boy had “viciously attacked” a year-old girl after her mother left them alone while she visited a nightclub.

headline.main: Alabama 8-Year-Old Charged With Murder in Toddler’s Beating
headline.print_headline: Alabama Boy, 8, Charged in Toddler’s Killing
